1178940.name: Bitlogic - OST
1178940.description:
Original Sound Track of Bitlogic, A Cyberpunk Arcade Adventure.
by Juan Antonio Maldonado.

Chiptune MSX version included.

Track List:

  • 01 Main theme
  • 02 Bit Log 427
  • 03 Intro to a Cyberpunk Adventure
  • 04 The underworld
  • 05 The sewers
  • 06 The ruined building
  • 07 Bit Log 32767
  • 08 The secret laboratory
  • 09 The headquarters
  • 10 Bit Log 65534
  • 11 A virtual swamp of doubts
  • 12 I K W I'M
  • 13 Bit Log -1
  • 14 The alternative headquarters
  • 15 Main theme (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 16 The underworld (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 17 The sewers (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 18 The ruined building (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 19 The secret laboratory (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 20 The headquarters (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 21 A virtual swamp of doubts (Chiptune MSX version)
  • 22 I K W I'M (Chiptune MSX version)
1178940.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 意大利语
